thread.section_title: Transcat Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Transcat | www.transcat.com
thread.title: Allen

author: Allen
title: Allen
text:
Hey my oscilloscope is just what I thought it would be, best value for the buck and an excellent meter/display.
Had a issue with shipping, it was way past due. I received promising replies from my emails explaining the delay. Third contact via a phone call settle the delay issue, 2 two days afterwards it was delivered. Let me say I am a patient person but this experience of a delayed delivery was not Transcat's fault.
